RAILWAY RECRUITMENT BOARD, CHANDIGARH 

 
GOVT. OF INDIA (MINISTRY OF RAILWAYS) 

Railway Colony, Near Railway Station, Chandigarh 

Website: www.rrbcdg.gov.in     E-mail: bisht.dinesh@gov.in      Phone No.: (0172) 2730093        Fax No.: (0172) 2730040 

2nd and final call for Document Verification against CEN No. 03/2015 

Provisionally shortlisted candidates who remained absent during 1st Document Verification are 
being given a 2nd and final chance to appear in person for Document Verification as per the following 
schedule. This is the 2nd and final call to absentee candidates for appearing in Document 
Verification, failing which their candidature will be rejected without further correspondence. No 
further chance will be given for document verification for any reason whatsoever. Such candidates 
are advised to visit respective RRB's website to download their e-Call letters for 2nd and final 
Document Verification. Email and SMS are also being sent to these candidates to download their 
e-Call letters.  

The Roll Numbers of such absentee candidates have been arranged below in ascending order horizontally. 

 
Date/day/time and venue for 2nd and final Document Verification: 12.09.2017 (Tuesday) from 09.00 AM. 
Venue: Railway Recruitment Board, Railway Colony, Near Railway Station, Chandigarh.
